name: Imbanana Jones and the Ancient Technology
name_original: Imbanana Jones and the Ancient Technology
description:
Join famous archaeologist Imbanana Jones in an adventure to recover the artifacts of a long lost civilization!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Spacebar to Jump

LMB : Use Artifact 1, RMB : Use Artifact 2 (Gotten later)

R : Restart Level, M : Mute "Music"

Made with Unity, Visual Studio, Clip Studio Paint and Audacity.
